Uses of Package
org.numenta.nupic.algorithms

  • Packages that use org.numenta.nupic.algorithms 
    Package Description
    org.numenta.nupic  
    org.numenta.nupic.algorithms  
    org.numenta.nupic.benchmarks  
    org.numenta.nupic.integration

    org.numenta.nupic.util  
  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.algorithms used by org.numenta.nupic 
    Class and Description
    Anomaly
    This module analyzes and estimates the distribution of averaged anomaly scores from a CLA model.
    CLAClassifier
    A CLA classifier accepts a binary input from the level below (the "activationPattern") and information from the sensor and encoders (the "classification") describing the input to the system at that time step.
    Classification
    Container for the results of a classification computation by the CLAClassifier
    SpatialPooler
    Handles the relationships between the columns of a region and the inputs bits.
    TemporalMemory
    Temporal Memory implementation in Java.
  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.algorithms used by org.numenta.nupic.algorithms 
    Class and Description
    Anomaly
    This module analyzes and estimates the distribution of averaged anomaly scores from a CLA model.
    Anomaly.AveragedAnomalyRecordList
    Container to hold interim AnomalyLikelihood calculations.
    Anomaly.Mode
    Modes to use for factory creation method
    AnomalyLikelihood
    The anomaly likelihood computer.
    AnomalyLikelihood.AnomalyParams
    Extends the dictionary key lookup functionality of the parent class to add definite typing for parameter retrieval.
    AnomalyLikelihoodMetrics
    Container class to hold the results of AnomalyLikelihood estimations and updates.
    BitHistory
    Stores an activationPattern bit history.
    CLAClassifier
    A CLA classifier accepts a binary input from the level below (the "activationPattern") and information from the sensor and encoders (the "classification") describing the input to the system at that time step.
    Classification
    Container for the results of a classification computation by the CLAClassifier
    MovingAverage
    Helper class for computing moving average and sliding window
    MovingAverage.Calculation
    Container for calculated data
    Sample
    A sample data point or record consisting of a timestamp, value, and score.
    SDRClassifier
    Implementation of a SDR classifier.
    SpatialPooler
    Handles the relationships between the columns of a region and the inputs bits.
    SpatialPoolerCompatibilityActives 
    SpatialPoolerCompatibilityPermanences 
    Statistic
    Container to hold a specific calculation for a statistical data point.
    TemporalMemory.ColumnData
    Used in the TemporalMemory.compute(Connections, int[], boolean) method to make pulling values out of the GroupBy2 more readable and named.
